content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Taron Egerton

}}
Taron Egerton is a Welsh actor who has received various awards and nominations throughout his career.
Egerton first gained recognition for starring as Gary "Eggsy" Unwin in the action comedy film Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014) and its sequel Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017), for which he won the Empire Award for Best Male Newcomer and was nominated for the Saturn Award for Best Actor. In 2014, he was also one of the nominees for the BAFTA Rising Star Award.
He received critical acclaim for his portrayal of singer-songwriter Elton John in the musical Rocketman (2019). The role won him the Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy and earned him nominations for the BAFTA Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role, the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Male Actor in a Leading Role, and the Grammy Award for Best Compilation Soundtrack for Visual Media for his work on the film score. He starred in the Apple TV+ miniseries Black Bird (2022), which garnered him further nominations at the BAFTA TV Awards, Golden Globe Awards, Primetime Emmy Awards and Screen Actors Guild Awards.
